name: Zimbabwe TB Community Disease Committees Project
description: NEW PROJECT ALERT: We are proud to launch a new project called 'Promoting meaningful community involvement in the Zimbabwe National TB Program through Community Disease Committees (CDCs) to  enhance access to services and to break down barriers'

name: CSN Innovation - Youth Engagement to promote environmental awareness
description: We were proud to support adolescent boys from Churchill Boys High School with citrus fruit trees. This support will help their efforts of scaling up nutrition, tackle climate change & generate income

name: Establishing Rural Women Protection Committees in response to rising cases of GBV in Mutoko
description: Women in Mutoko decry the abuse of traditional courts by village heads who preside over GBV and Child Abuse cases. They demand transperancy, fairness and a framework that provides oversight on traditional leaders during court proceedings

name: Murara Irrigation Scheme
description: Murara irrigation scheme is located in Mutoko District of Mashonaland East Province. It is one of the successful farmer managed schemes. We discuss how the scheme is being impacted by climate change

name: Strengthening of learning and skills development to tackle climate change
description: DEMT attending the Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC), were youth organizations from across Zimbabwe came to together to produce a position paper that reflects the voice & concerns of young people in relation to climate change.

name: Disaster Risk Management plans
description: Disaster and Environmental Management Trust attending the Disaster Risk Management Workshop. The workshop is focusing on training and planning for the District Civil Protection Coordination Committee (DCPCC): Updating Disaster Risk Management plans.

name: Making of the documentary
description: Research project planning meeting. DEMtrust and Nyahunure at Mutoko Rural District Council. The project aims at creating a documentary film to capture the resilience building projects being implemented by Nyahunure community trust

name: GBV and Women Empowerment
description: The importance and objective purposeful impact of the International Women's Day. It is a call for all to fight for their upliftment, dignity and empowerment. Gender based inequities, injustices and inequalities should be fought across all spheres of society

name: Local Natural Resource Managemen
description: Efforts towards enhancing Natural Resource Management in Mutoko is forging ahead. DEMtrust currently with SilveiraHouse, advancing CBOs natural resources management advocacy actions.

name: Gender and Child Abuse through cultural belief systems and traditional practices
description: A reflection on the result of mainly cultural practices, gender inequalities and gender-based discriminations, which are rife in Africa

name: Importance of community education to help combat environmental degradation
description: Today we commenced the implementation of a project in partnership with AdamMolaiFoundation in Chimukopa community in ward 6, Mutoko District. The project is meant to raise community awareness on the effects of environmental degradation and building the capacities of grassroots communities to become effective advocates of environmental justice.

name: Integration with the disabled within community for participation in nutrition wellness
description: At Kubatana for Nutrition Group in Chimukopa community, we witnessed an integration between the disabled and the able-bodied working together on nutrition sensitive and nutrition specific projects. The CSO is raising awareness for the nutritional wellness of people living with disabilities in the marginalized rural communities of Mashonaland east province.
